Description.header:
Extracts the cyclomatic complexity metrics: `mmcc`, `tmcc`, `sif`, `lif` - and commits a transaction in order to create/update RRD silos by the extracted metric span representing the current project state.

It uses the RRD data silos configuration as described by appropriated parameters of the `rrd` API query.
Description.body:
To make a query:

`echo "0" > api.pmccabe_collector.restapi.org/rrd_analytic/rrd/collect/POST/exec`

To wait and extract the query result:

`cat api.pmccabe_collector.restapi.org/rrd_analytic/rrd/collect/POST/result`
Description.footer: Although the query doesn't return anything useful for API consumer, it'd better wait on the output pipe until the query has been finished
